title: Return to service of a former member who has vested benefit status
context: [ยง88-343] Return to service of a former member who has vested benefit status. If a former class H member who has a vested benefit status as provided in section 88-341(b) returns to service before the former member&rsquo;s retirement, the former member shall again become a member and shall contribute for membership service as provided by the law in effect during the member&rsquo;s reenrolled period of membership, and the former member shall be credited with service credit for the service the member had when the member terminated employment and the member&rsquo;s new and previous accumulated contributions shall be combined. [L 2004, c 179, pt of ยง1]
